meaningMnemonic: You take some <radical>flowers</radical> and some <radical>fruit</radical> and you make a <kanji>cake</kanji> out of it. It’s a very nice looking, flavorful cake. The fruit makes it taste great and the flowers make for great cake decorations.
readingMnemonic: You’re standing back, admiring your <kanji>cake</kanji> when you hear a <reading>ca</reading>r (か) engine revving and before you know it your cake has been run over. The car came out of nowhere and ran your cake right over, spraying fruit cake bits and flowers all over the place. Stupid car!
